cloneRepository.headline: Clone repository
cloneRepository.content: Click on the 'Clone repository' button to clone the repository.

useSourceTree.headline: Clone in SourceTree
useSourceTree.content: Click on the 'Clone in SourceTree' button to clone the repository in SourceTree. Alternatively, you can also sopy the displayed URL and paste it into your git client.

sourceTreeTutorial.headline: SourceTree Tutorial
sourceTreeTutorial.content: If you are not familiar with SourceTree, then have a look at our short tutorial on it.
